scripts.deploy_evolutionChain_test: npx webpack && gcloud beat functions deploy evolutionChain_test --gen2 --entry-point evolutionChain --trigger-http --memory=256MiB --region=europe-west1 --runtime=nodejs18 --env-vars-file test.env.yaml --project=fakeproject
